name: vite-vue-microfrontends
description: Vite + Module Federation is now possible

scripts.postinstall:deps: npm --prefix ./host run build && npm --prefix ./remote run build
scripts.preview:host: npm --prefix ./host run build && npm --prefix ./host run preview
scripts.preview:remote: npm --prefix ./remote run build && npm --prefix ./remote run preview
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn preview:remote && yarn preview:host & wait-on http-get://localhost:4173/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/tests/runAll.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
